N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 1.1 - General statement

State Regulations

Pursuant to the provisions of section
234-b
of the

Banking Law, the Banking Board is prepared to authorize a State-chartered
savings bank to exercise, through a trust department, any or all of the powers
specified in sections
100, 100-a, 100-b
and
100-c
of the

Banking Law, in accordance with applicable law, provided that: (a) the granting of such powers to the
institution will promote the convenience and advantage of the public; and
(b) the proposed management of
the trust department commands confidence and warrants the belief that the
business of such department will be honestly and efficiently conducted in
accordance with the intent and purpose of applicable law. Notes
